name: Triple Sex
description:
"This is a typical RPG world of swords and magic. Here, the story begins." - ingame summary.
You play as John, captain of the elite American unit Triple Sex. Your mission is to rescue the president from terrorists.
This game is part of the Sis RPG series, and, contrary to what one might expect, does not contain RPG or fantasy elements or sex, but is instead a shmup platformer.
